Package io.micronaut.r2dbc

Class R2dbcConnectionFactoryBean

java.lang.Object
io.micronaut.r2dbc.R2dbcConnectionFactoryBean
@Factory public class R2dbcConnectionFactoryBean extends Object
Core factory bean that exposes the following beans.
  • The ConnectionFactoryOptions.Builder
  • The ConnectionFactoryOptions
  • The ConnectionFactory
Since:
1.0.0
Author:
graemerocher
